languageKey.label: Questionaire results.
Displays all results from the questionaire, even if not finished.
tx_pbsurvey_item
Use this to temporarily exclude this result from display and export to csv file with the module Web > Questionaire.
Setting this option is practical when exporting the results to a csv file. You can, for instance, exclude this result that was meant for testing purposes only.
The parent result field this answer belongs to.

Do not change this field if you want reliable results from the questionaire. Changing this field will exclude the answer from being exported to a csv file if the results do not match the ones of the questionaire that generated this answer.
tx_pbsurvey_results
The question this answer belongs to.
This is the question asked at the frontend user by the questionaire. , the user gave this answer to.
tx_pbsurvey_item, fe_users
Field containing all answers from a single response.
Do not change this field unless you know what you are doing.
tx_pbsurvey
